column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: Police arrested a man who threw stones at Prime Minister Hun Sen’s villa near Independence Monument in Daun Penh on the morning of January 8
column5: bodyguards who were on duty outside the fence arrested the person and sent him to the police in Chaktomok district.------The man was named as Rith Piseth
column6: a 31-year-old Cambodian resident of Kbal Koh Village
column9: Kandal Province. The Ministry of Interior will take further action according to legal procedures. ------THMEYLOAD
